title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 76 - Occupational Therapy
content:

State Regulations
§ 76.1 - Professional study of occupational therapy
§ 76.2 - Supervised experience
§ 76.3 - Licensing examinations
§ 76.4 - Limited permits
§ 76.5 - Definition of occupational therapy practice
§ 76.6 - Definition of occupational therapy assistant practice and the use of the title occupational therapy assistant
§ 76.7 - Requirements for licensure as an occupational therapy assistant
§ 76.8 - Supervision of occupational therapy assistant
§ 76.9 - Occupational therapy assistant student exemption
§ 76.10 - Continuing competency for occupational therapists and occupational therapy assistants
§ 76.11 - Providing treatment in the practice of occupational therapy without referral

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 76

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 212, 6504, 6506, 6507, 7901, 7905, 7906, 7908[1][a], [b], [c][2]-[6], arts. 130, 131, 133, 135, 139, 143, 144, 147, 148, 155, 156, 159; L. 2011, ch. 460; L. 2012, ch. 329, § 5, ch. 444, § 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
